reviews.name: T-fal Balanced Living Juice Extractor
reviews.reviewText: I didn't get this from Walmart but I wanted to review this awesome juicer! When everything is assembled, you'll need quite a bit of counter space. I use it on my island. It juices fast and I love how it has the little attachment inside the pitcher that catches all the foam. I've put in whole carrots, apples with peel, core and all, and spinach. Everything goes through just fine. Taking apart everything to wash is a breeze and it's nice that I can just throw it in the dishwasher. I have hand washed everything and it really takes no time at all. Mine was discounted about 25% but I would definitely buy it full price knowing how well it works. There is one con, but it doesn't really bother me. The "no drip spout" does drip so I would suggest placing a small towel underneath your juicer when in use. I have granite counter tops and anything and everything ruins them! Definitely a must buy if you're into or curious about juicing. This product is sturdy and works well. I don't see myself having to replace it anytime soon.
reviews.title: Loveee it!

reviews.name: T-fal Balanced Living Juice Extractor
reviews.reviewText:
This is the best-kept secret around & WHY this juicer is NOT in the 1ST row of picks when you search for juicers is a CRIME!!

I have used the Breville fountain xp plus whatever it’s called the one that EVERYBODY used and THIS IS BETTER!!! $299 vs. $61 LOL ah I’ll take T-fal Balanced Living Juice Extractor!!

EZ to clean up, 2 speeds everything the big EXPENSIVE ones have and I can buy 3 of these for LESS than 1 of those!!

AND I NEVER thought the PULP would come
out so DRY…Dryer than Breville 800JEXL Juice Fountain Elite 1000-Watt Juice Extractor
or the other more expensive ones I have used!

EVERYTHING about the T-fal Balanced Living Juice Extractor has surprised me and surpassed my fondest hopes!!
reviews.title: BETTER THAN THE HIGH PRICED ONES

reviews.name: T-fal Balanced Living Juice Extractor
reviews.reviewText: This juicer does what is says it will do. My family of four did a 5 day juice fast and it performed perfectly. It is fast, cleans up quickly (10 minutes or less depending on what you put in it), and it provides a lot of juice. For the price it was the perfect juicer to start with.
reviews.title: Great Juicer for the price

reviews.name: T-fal Balanced Living Juice Extractor
reviews.reviewText: The juicer is living up to my expectations and more. Super affordable, super easy to use, and clean. I'm currently using it everyday and haven't had a single problem with the daily "strain" on the juicer, despite how much "cheaper" it is than all the other brands.
reviews.title: Wonderful juicer

reviews.name: T-fal Balanced Living Juice Extractor
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to start juicing to help keep my blood pressure in line and this product is getting the job done.
reviews.title: Trial Run
